description.tchinese: 用一顆子彈擊殺5個敵人

description.english: Kill a boss in 3 seconds after it appears

description.turkish: Bir boss belirdikten sonra 3 saniye içinde onu öldür.

description.english: Complete an operation without moving from the 3rd minute onwards
description.japanese: 3分目から動かずに行動を完了する
description.schinese: 从第3分钟起，原地不动完成整场行动
description.tchinese: 從第3分鐘起，原地不動完成整場行動

description.english: Complete an operation without getting hit
description.japanese: ダメージを受けずに作戦を完了する
description.turkish: Bir operasyonu hiç hasar almadan tamamla.

description.japanese: クリティカルヒットで1000体の敵を倒す
